attributes.action: Call a General Election now, and let the people have their say
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do the right thing. Call a general election now and let the public voice their anger. An election at this time will see the highest voter turn-outs for 20 years. This can only be good for politics, and good for the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
